contents.item: You must detach yourself from the stereotypical life to live an effective one
With the love of music, there will be no misery in life.
When we allow people to fellowship with us, God welcomes us into fellowshipping with Him
Service to humanity is the key to gaining the Kingdom of God
Man is not made for the Sabbath. Rather, the Sabbath is made for man
We get distracted through employment and rarely have time to discover our true selves
You get answers and solutions to your problems when you begin to notice God
Humans are the world’s greatest treasure
When you begin to serve people, God begins to serve you
The best way to appreciate God is to appreciate His creation
Joblessness makes you live without the fear of being fired
People-based service is God-based service
There is no serving God without serving man
Living a selfish life is a recipe for disaster
Let your neighbor’s needs be your concern
We fellowship with God when we fellowship with people
It is impossible to pause, stop or delay time
A selfish living is a wasteful living
The only people remembered in history are the ones that dedicate their lives to service and purpose
When you begin to serve people, salvation locates you
Love is about sharing
Greatness is the quality of time converted into production or value
Stop trying to make a living and begin to live
It is only when we meet the needs of the people around us that God meets our needs
Gain great values by converting your time
All men are equal in God’s presence
You have to be skillful in your time management to be productive
The purpose of the Kingdom is the essence of life
Our service as believers is in our help and attitude towards others
We disqualify ourselves from communicating with God when we refuse to open our hearts to people
Work to fulfill your calling
Everyone should be seen as a carrier of God’s nature
Work is not about survival alone
Most High God, how excellent is thy Holy name.
You dishonor God when you don’t treat His people with love
The nature of God is in every man
Love is the easiest way of evangelism
Brotherly love should be our number one principle as believers
Value-added time produces multiplication and production
You only work right when you are fulfilling the essence of your creation
In the desert, the only god is a well.
contents.owner: Vera Nazarian, Dreams of the Compass Rose

contents.item: Serving God is equivalent to serving men
Always appreciate the good in people
There is no communication with God without communication with God’s people
Appreciate and find ways to invest in yourself
All humans are important to God, so treat them all with love
Service to humanity has no alternative
When we allow people to come into our environment, God gives us His environment
When you celebrate a person, you are celebrating the creator of that person
Love for people is the basis of our fellowship with God
Life is given for increase and multiplication of the glory of God
The value of a substance is the product of the time spent to achieve it
Employment is a major time killer
The nature of Christ is love
To help people is to help God
All the breakthroughs and miracles you need are in people
God opens heavenly doors for us when we are rejected by people
You have to be skillful in your time management to be effective in life
You get divine blessings when you love and cherish both those who love and hate you
For your life to count, you need to begin to live for others
You can only build yourself effectively in the area of your calling
Love is about self-denial
Fellowshipping with people is life
Don’t always deprive yourself trying to please others
The idea of life is maximizing your time and living and effective life
It is only when you trust in God that you can make it life
An effective life is not determined by how long you lived
We celebrate God when we share in each other’s joy and pain
Direct your attention to men and find ways to put smiles on their faces
The secret of effective living is detachment
Work to fulfill destiny
Life cannot be in existence without time
You only honor and worship God when you do things without expecting anything in return
Don’t fellowship with people around you alone, explore and reach out to more people
Reconsider your life and see how you can make things work for yourself
You cannot discover God without discovering people
You cannot receive God when you block people from your life
Celebrate people and love them even at their lowest point
Your gift or calling enables you to ask the question of what to do
Work becomes satisfaction when it is in the area of your calling
Life becomes pleasurable when you are moving in the direction of your calling
Don’t waste your youthful and active days on employment
The purpose of life has eternal consequences
Love is the greatest attribute of God
The principle of God is love
Your solution is in the next person
The real service to God is when it involves people in need
You need to live a life of service to make your life an effective one
Salary is the currency that is gotten from mortgaging your life and time
We all have the potential to be great and the seed of greatness
